body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. My name is Christopher Russell and I'm from XYZ Car Dealership. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sandra. Could you please provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is s.smith@example.com and my phone number is 555 one zero zero zero two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information. Can you provide me with your home address as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my home address is one two three Main Street, Cityville, State ABC.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for that. Is there anything specific you're looking for today, Sandra?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling frustrated about the pricing I saw online. It seems too high.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Sandra. Let me look into that for you. Thank you for sharing your feedback.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Sandra. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any more questions. Have a great day!
